name: Crossbow Warrior - The Legend of William Tell
description: Crossbow Warrior has 29 exciting levels with 4 different game types like classical Jump'n'run-, Sniper-, TempleRun-, Boat-Levels! Experience the whole story behind the legend of William Tell with a multitude of lovely graphics!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 and above Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM) i5 Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GT 710 or AMD Radeon HD 8500  and above

reviews.review_text: Oh my goodness.... no. Just no.   Pros -Ok music, probably gets repetitive -They mix up the type of gameplay (but it really isn't ever fun) -Bright an colorful graphics (but they are still bad even at 2k)  Cons -Bad story telling -Terrible gameplay mechanics -Let me just reiterate, TERRIBLE gameplay mechanics -Boring  Would be a mediocre $1 game on a smart phone. Maybe 50 cents to a dollar on steam I would buy it again and get the achievements.  I am returning this btw. It ain't worth the $4.68 I spent on it
